examples.full_description: Island relationships can access the associated treasures
Island relationships can access the associated pirates
Island validations must have a name
Pirate relationships can access the associated treasures
Pirate relationships can access the associated islands
Pirate validations must have a name

examples.description: must have an age between 18 and 100
examples.full_description: Pirate validations must have an age between 18 and 100
Treasure relationships can access the associated pirate
Treasure relationships can access the associated island

examples.description: returns an array of all islands
examples.full_description: Islands GET /islands returns an array of all islands
Islands GET /islands returns a status of 200 (OK)

examples.description: returns an array of all pirates
examples.full_description: pirates GET /pirates returns an array of all pirates

examples.description: does not return any nested islands
examples.full_description: pirates GET /pirates does not return any nested islands
pirates GET /pirates returns a status of 200 (OK)

examples.description: returns the matching pirate with its associated islands
examples.full_description: pirates GET /pirates/:id with a valid ID returns the matching pirate with its associated islands
pirates GET /pirates/:id with a valid ID returns a status of 200 (OK)
pirates GET /pirates/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: pirates GET /pirates/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
pirates DELETE /pirates/:id with a valid ID deletes the pirate
pirates DELETE /pirates/:id with a valid ID deletes the associated treasures
pirates DELETE /pirates/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: pirates DELETE /pirates/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
Treasures POST /treasures with valid data creates a new treasure

examples.description: returns the associated pirate and island data
examples.full_description: Treasures POST /treasures with valid data returns the associated pirate and island data
Treasures POST /treasures with valid data returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not create a new treasure
examples.full_description: Treasures POST /treasures with invalid data does not create a new treasure
Treasures POST /treasures with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: Treasures POST /treasures with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)

examples.description: does not define unnecessary pirate routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary pirate routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary island routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary island routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary treasure routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary treasure routes
